attributes.action: Right of appeal for uk family visit visas.
attributes.background:
we people living here in uk can't go to our back home contries all the time.
Because of work family issue or anything, that's why we want to call our familes here in uk to visit us.
Home office is refusing visas for little little things and wrong things.
Basically they don't want to give visas.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
